content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: brewing_stand
inventory=[{"type": "zombie_head", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 11}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 19}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a brewing stand, I need to place a blaze rod in the center of the crafting grid, so I will move it from slot 23 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brewing_stand
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "zombie_head", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 11}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 19}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}]
thought: Next, I need to place cobblestone to the left and right of the blaze rod, so I will move one cobblestone from slot 42 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brewing_stand
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "zombie_head", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 11}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 19}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Then, I will move another cobblestone from slot 42 to slot 5, completing the brewing stand recipe.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brewing_stand
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "zombie_head", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 11}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 19}]

thought: The recipe is now complete, but I have run out of cobblestone. Fortunately, I have some blackstone available, which can also be used to craft a brewing stand. So, I will move the blackstone from slot 13 to slot 6.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brewing_stand
inventory=[{"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "zombie_head", "quantity": 48, "index": 10}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 64, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass", "quantity": 43, "index": 19}]
thought: Finally, I will move the brewed stand from slot 0 to slot 12, completing the task.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
